9eefc7a3-6103-43a6-bf2f-9aa49dcbdcfd: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a single Flamer Shot: Stream once per combat. Flamer Shot: Stream: -(from 8 to 12) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} -5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} -6 {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} -applies {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (4)
ac15254b-844e-4ed6-9304-37bba52fe708: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a single Laser Shot once per combat. Laser Shot: -(from 8 to 10) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} -10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} -4 {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} -100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}
a2bbdd14-c81b-4155-9ec8-39d2f75ce27a: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to use Melta Scorching ({g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}) once per combat. Melta Scorching (Area Attack): -(from 10 to 14) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} -50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} -8 {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}
1ff576f7-8565-4f4c-8d4e-0006a0a5dab7:
A ring weapon that fires a single liquefier shot.
Can only be used once per combat.
e6b803e3-20fd-428d-88a3-523ae5a496f8:
A ring weapon that fires a single melta shot.
Can only be used once per combat.
317f1436-7da8-4f0d-ac85-d30044bc1e56:
A ring weapon that fires a single plasma shot.
Can only be used once per combat.
23758468-7fc7-4350-b88a-3a35acfb943a:
A ring weapon that fires a single sliver needle coated with viral {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (5).
Can only be used once per combat.
06af901b-8efa-4e09-9378-78431dd4a644:
A ring weapon that fires a single tesla shot.
Can only be used once per combat.
494b7f26-3b5f-49e7-9448-7c549253f0d7: After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomenon{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, the wearer immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and <u>({g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} / 2)</u> (minimum 1) {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
871b808a-db35-49da-907a-42773dc3f16b: After using Run and Gun, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} when in cover for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
90672f1d-7951-4be5-bbc6-3ef7c6a173eb: Any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the wearer's single attacks inflict +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} if the target fails an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Stacks.
d6e4690c-1625-45da-8ce3-f7d57f158160: At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the shadow field {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. The effect is lost when the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by a ranged attack and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from it.
48165717-e225-47be-b93d-79e6b6a95b65: At the beginning of the holder's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all enemies in a 3-cell radius gain +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} for each common {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on this enemy.
ab4c8cd6-256c-448d-9a58-edb753c7cf4b: At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} status on the enemy with the highest {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} without spending a charge of Hunt Down the Prey and grants a double Hunt Down the Prey {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for its kill.
86ba9f8a-2035-4fa5-9266-1af815487a8f:
At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} is removed from that ally.
091cff14-4942-491a-86dc-d38cef6e2256:
At the start of the wearer's turn, they gain <u>(2 × equipped {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g})</u> temporary wounds. When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0, they fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and gain 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. The wearer becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} of adjacent enemies. While prone, if the wearer has no other allies with more than 0 wounds, they and their allies die.
On the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they regain 30% of their wounds if they still have temporary wounds.
This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} activates only once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
fc96d8ce-7b24-4d43-bfec-3a53c1bc966e: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is reduced by −1.
46d999f9-6216-48b8-b63a-dc6907b781fb: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} creatures. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} is removed from the wearer as well.
bd92eac0-0285-4176-9417-fa01822962cd: Contaminates a 3-cell radius area, which inflicts 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and applies {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
47586fe8-3aae-47d1-8c7f-bc5b396e0bfe: Deals <u>(from 12 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, they become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
3335de2b-5cbd-4104-a3f3-f36707a3d58b:
Each time the wearer uses a minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.
Thick luck allows those affected to reroll of a failed attack, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} and is then removed.
cc561346-e33f-47d1-8db1-e7ff4163c456: Enemies that are targeted by the wearer's psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) and {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}.
b181eedd-4563-4b4e-8538-29b7e078d29f:
Every spent {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} grants +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to the wearer.
Also, the wearer's movement isn't affected by threatened areas.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
8682e5ee-3f27-48fc-84f6-5ae9a3cacc76: Every time when more than 2 targets are {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wielder gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
208bfa95-d9fa-4e49-b6e2-6cdbfe18690a: Every wearer's single attack gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} on the target.
8e3b8386-e257-4485-8295-59890e4d02f5: Fires a short stream of flame, damaging enemies in a line.
6f64fc9c-b687-4a0d-ab9d-b476657b20ca:
Fires a single stinger pod shot that deals <u>(from 12 to 21)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Can only be used once per combat.
41fd31b3-9ada-41e8-a309-108dc40ecb68:
Grants +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
The wearer can reroll any failed skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once for each test.
376c43c1-65ae-4e48-912d-1ec393254064: Grants +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g}, but the wielder suffers +<u>(Lore (Warp) / 3)</u>% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from psychic and Navigator powers.
2a888005-64f1-43db-8d43-c0d1882b0a76:
Grants +20 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.
The wearer gains +<u>(Lore (Imperium) / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and deals +<u>(Lore (Imperium) / 10)</u>% critical damage to xenos and daemons.
Also, they can reroll a failed test once per test.
0c01b145-835a-4952-91d1-6903ccab310b: Grants +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}. The wearer gains the Solve Simulacrum {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On success, Solve Simulacrum is removed, the Cogni-Simulacrum is destroyed, the +25 Logic bonus is lost, and the wearer permanently gains the Paradox Solved feature. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.
da7781bc-51fd-4ede-8459-1b18a801b40a: Grants a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} and a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.
bc57dd0b-9c3e-4fb8-9af1-85e98fb25faa: Grants the wearer +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, but reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} by −5%.
807148f5-b70c-4793-9aa5-baafbaa4269d: If an ally under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the wearer's Bring It Down! ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.
82f39805-edd2-43ca-9b3d-85e02c5725c8: If the wearer didn't spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +10 to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} next turn.
ca38e3c5-9456-44e8-9959-f8d690c5019d: If the wearer has 8 or more {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the rest of the combat.
1280aaad-8fe1-4093-963e-eb4f63cd4a86: Malefic Tome — Belief in the Inscrutable
0ad5c806-6942-4ab1-978a-0bb07226f170: On the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, the wearer gains a number of additional attacks equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
15092619-665b-4fc2-99d9-5746fff75dbb: Once per turn, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
754d5eb7-56f8-42f1-95bd-d7600137eac4: The Charge {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} against daemons and xenos.
71e70c96-0752-4723-b3e9-61a9eec5003e:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants beneficial powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +50</indent>
-<indent=5%>All common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from all allies</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies gain +<u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat</indent>
aec2e200-1ded-453c-a83c-e4d737b3d250:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +30</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies gain +<u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat</indent>
ce22261a-a8f6-4713-9dba-4c06dbc0a9b8:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants special privileges:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +20</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +<u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</indent>
0c2c2b57-cf60-473e-a04e-01df2c700af1:
The user gains +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g} / 10)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} from combat stimulants.
Using combat stimulants costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
ef9d8e33-b287-48d6-b97c-c90c28949800:
The user gains +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g} / 20)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} from combat stimulants.
The first use of any combat stimulant per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
2e8fff1c-7ab9-4bf8-89a1-100680d8f9b3: The wearer always auto-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the first {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from each attacker on the battlefield.
0a7849db-d8f1-4aff-8e22-f8a9171a2bba: The wearer always has the highest {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} in combat.
242cc238-302f-4e98-ac41-fb7890e17c77: The wearer can make an inferno pistol shot at short {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} once per combat. That shot deals <u>(from 10 to 14)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and has 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
bf122d15-d276-4252-affb-ceff7d9dfc3c: The wearer can move without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} as long as they have less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left.
a702c6d8-37e3-4bd3-ad8b-6b4a0660e3d4:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.
143d8616-09b3-4bc1-8619-14cb738c3e14:
The wearer cannot use psychic or Navigator powers.
The wearer suffers −{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}<u>Lore (Imperium)</u>{/g}% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.
The wearer gains a <u>Lore (Imperium)</u>% chance to ignore any {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} inflicted by psychic or Navigator powers.
a749efcc-855c-474c-836b-8a2a228d0637: The wearer does not lose the Elusive {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} if they attack from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.
7ed610d6-f2d5-48fe-bade-0f8e77b9f634:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} should be decreased to 0 for the first time in combat, they are restored up to 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} instead.
7c7fc4bb-897e-428c-988c-d48a82991a9e: The wearer gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} and the Inquisitor's Command {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Command grants: -+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} -{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius -All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}
7fcd67e5-09c8-4882-832c-6821d82cc6b8: The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, and their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} with weapons deal an additional +<u>(Demolition / 10)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
03b65e7a-7ac7-468b-b6dc-de6c54f78b0c: The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} and the Inquisitor's Decree {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Decree grants: -+30 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} -{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies -All allies gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +(wearer's Persuasion / 7)% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat
bbca63a3-d658-4df4-bea3-e462bebd392a: The wearer gains +40 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} and the Inquisitor's Tenet {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per combat. Inquisitor's Tenet grants: -+50 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} -All common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are removed from all allies -All allies gain +(wearer's Persuasion / 7) temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, +(wearer's Persuasion / 7)% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, and +(wearer's Persuasion / 20) {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat
81a35846-1d71-4a33-89b0-63acbed84f74: The wearer gains a <u>(number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks)</u>% chance to ignore any incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
16f4f3c4-d751-4159-8e79-1d2ceb685ed0: The wearer gains a permanent +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10)</u> (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. This bonus is doubled if the wearer's attack triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}.
ed6c0984-8d64-4bc4-b172-958a3ce6e977: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not spent {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. Stacks up to 5 times.
5e491d9e-92ff-48fd-b548-07e0b831b86d:
The wearer gains immunity to effects depending on the number of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks:
-<indent=5%>6 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}</indent>
The wearer gains all previous immunities.
1c447733-7811-44cd-9499-299f55bbb112:
The wearer gains the following:
-<indent=5%>+25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>uses Agility instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, Toughness instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and Strength instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>regenerates <u>(TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.</indent>
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} they deal is increased by +1% until the end of combat, while their Intelligence, Willpower, and Fellowship are reduced by −1 (no less than 1) until the end of combat.
c8743a84-e6ab-4a2c-a0f0-05a710be0f65: The wearer of this amulet gains a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

f7dbbe93-ca30-47df-ad7e-d1c0a14e09c2:

If the owner has medium or heavy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equipped, at the start of their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in combat, they gain +<u>(Tech-Use / 10)</u>% armour.
bd0e07a6-270d-45af-94c0-62f14288c2b8:
This item grants its wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.
Once per battle: can be used to immediately remove all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects from enemies in a 10-cell radius. If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary, they do not suffer the Fellowship {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} from the talisman and gains an additional +<u>(wearer's WP bonus + 5)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against humans.
a8161368-5943-464e-83f3-4881dd0d6a72: This tome is full of terrifying descriptions recounting heretical magic experiments and twisted laws of the warp. Although it contains forbidden knowledge, to read through it is to welcome hideous visions into one's head.
79580801-8245-4795-ae5d-529faf5079e7: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and triggers a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for the wielder with a −167 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. Paradox Solved: this character can use their {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} regardless of their {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, without spending momentum.

f1e53299-d969-4dc2-9a2b-3457165ad47e: When the wearer attacks a target with any {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). 5652ae3c-eb54-4e66-b173-961a71a8d7cf: When the wielder attacks with any {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at a 1-cell range, that attack also inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).
d5c8582a-05dd-4d7d-a3f0-f73db4bdb05d: Whenever the wearer attacks any target in a 5-cell radius around them with a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon, this attack deals <u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} / 3)</u>% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
944fd818-0272-4eca-b107-bdc1f792591d:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.
23ab07cd-67fa-46f0-911d-6a7fb7c71149:
Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can reroll the parry {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once.
If they wield dual {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, they can reroll the parry test twice.
47a607a8-9525-4bce-80fb-31a70d2acb94: Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
a78aa040-95ff-49af-b61a-b232e428cbf6: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they receive a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat.
79acd456-c057-4d8b-b815-c799eb564c86: Whenever the wearer spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, all adjacent enemies suffer a −<u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
edadd6c0-b4f4-4a89-911f-bf74270a05f6: Whenever the wearer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with no enemies adjacent, they gain +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
0fcd1c50-4537-4e6b-b69e-d82e42d25d28:
Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.
a17860b3-a906-40e6-9be5-06461270846b: Whenever the wearer targets 3 or more enemies with one attack, those targets suffer −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} × amount of targeted enemies)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.
7f06e488-dcb4-4d97-9a2a-af4291a58a0d: Whenever the wearer uses Combat Locus, the benefits of the targeted zone are multiplied by 4 instead of being doubled.
be789a72-a60a-417b-84df-35e8ac71aa61: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell.
cfd72b7e-2240-447b-8656-ec40448750a7: Whenever the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, they gain +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% to all psychic {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
1518ba75-c47f-46b7-bc04-97a6ee2f48da: Whenever the wearer uses a non-attacking consumable item (e.g. stimulant, medikit, etc.), it counts as an attack of a different type than the previous attack for the purposes of Versatility.
347c688c-811a-42f9-8c47-33fdf9c59a3e: Whenever the wearer uses a non-attacking consumable item (e.g. stimulant, medikit, etc.), it counts as an attack of a different type than the previous attack for the purposes of Versatility. 9a125753-4ef1-4a1b-8f42-3f85bd9859c1: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Stacks up to 3 times.
8922a79d-b8eb-4e09-bfb6-dca7736b6500: Whenever the wearer's ally is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the Joint Analysis {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, the wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.
